name: AVCaptureAudioFileOutput
desc: A capture output that records audio and saves the recorded audio to a file.

items.name: class func availableOutputFileTypes() -> [AVFileType]
items.desc: Returns an array containing UTIs identifying the file types AVCaptureAudioFileOutput can write.

items.name: func startRecording(to: URL, outputFileType: AVFileType, recordingDelegate: AVCaptureFileOutputRecordingDelegate)
items.desc: Tells the receiver to start recording to a new file of the specified format, and specifies a delegate that will be notified when recording is finished.

items.name: var audioSettings: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The settings used to decode or re-encode audio before it is output by the receiver.

items.name: var metadata: [AVMetadataItem]
items.desc: A collection of metadata to be written to the receiver's output files.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new audio file output.
